nodes.bodyText: Couldn't we just set this to omniRefit and ignore the if statement?
Unless I'm missing something, the block starting a L904 is reached by any vehicle refit that changes the number of external (non-engine-free) heat sinks. (i.e. not just OmniVehicles)
Correct, but is the setOmniPodded to isOmniRefit cheaper than an if statement followed the setter?
Ah, I understand what you're saying  now - good suggestion.
